_description: A love lyric — twelve cross-rhymed quatrains

TCD157.First Lines:
Thoythis fre þat lykes meqwar I go styll as any stoneI
                    may thynk qwat euer I well& as leff at nay leffand
                    mane…
TCD157.Last Lines:
…with þam at I luff best of qu[ ]thyng ye man [ ]ne of
                    heyr in[ ] ys dwellynge
TCD157.Note: Bottoms of both leaves damaged, with loss of text.
TCD157.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “A Late-Fifteenth Century Love Lyric.” 
             Modern Language Notes
         69 (1954): 153-60: 155-7.
